snippet: An initiative modeled after a Police Department program to reduce crime will analyze claims data to identify potential problems across various city agencies.
abstract: New York City Comptroller Scott M Stringer's office will use initiative ClaimStat to analyze claims made against city to identify potential problems across various city agencies; goal is to curb claims made by people who seek compensation for injuries they say are New York's fault.
lead_paragraph: An initiative modeled after a Police Department program to reduce crime will analyze claims data to identify potential problems across various city agencies.

headline.main: Comptroller Aims to Curb Personal-Injury Claims Against New York City
headline.print_headline: Comptroller Is Offering Plan to Curb Claims Filed Against City
